channel.title: Need these.. Urgent. [Dodian]
channel.description:
Hi I need these for Halloween event, please post. I do not want to let my server down.
-How do I make NPC's speak? I tried I get errors so please post your code.
-Making NPC teleport you and sendMessage to you when killed.
-Adding some type of option to give treats when you right click someone.
Guys, please help I appreciate so much. If you help your adding to my list of people to give rep to. Once I have enough you get repped. Thanks for help guys

item.title: Need these.. Urgent. [Dodian]
item.dc:creator: @Nuke207 Nuke207
item.description:
@Nuke207 wrote:

[code]
}
if ((npcs[i].npcType == 81)
if (misc.random2(50) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Moo”;
}

  npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo";
  What the NPC is saying /\
  if ((npcs[i].npcType == 81)
  The NPC's ID               /\
